description: Complete system overview focusing on GPU optimization architecture, component interactions, and core optimization strategies
Detailed documentation of GPU memory distribution algorithms, tensor parallel splits calculation, and memory allocation strategies from optimizer.py and gpu_info.py
Comprehensive documentation of LLM execution workflows, including command generation for llama.cpp and vLLM, configuration parameters, and GPU resource allocation flow
Technical details of the telemetry system, including GPU metrics collection, utilization tracking, and alert mechanism implementation from telemetry.py and tray.py
Documentation of data flow between components, including GPU resource data, optimization parameters, and monitoring metrics across the system
